creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: child at R standing proudly, holding a glass in his PL hand; two boys seated on floor at LL, looking towards standing boy; dog near LRC; interior of a dark room
marks:
Signature, Label 

in graphite on verso: P 5470  initialed in plate, lower right: [DW]
initialed i
provenance: William Esdaile; [N.W. Lott & H.J. Gerrish Ltd, London and Wiltshire; [Paul McCarron; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Interior with Three Boys and a Dog
